handle

public void handle(Doc doc,
                   Doc before,
                   XTag tag,
                   IndexedHashMap columns,
                   Row row,
                   int where)
Description copied from class: TagHandler
handle (XDoc) handles the document, popping the parts it parses. what is left of the document is what is after the closing tag of the part the handler was to parse.

Specified by:
handle in class TagHandler
Parameters:
doc - - the document to handle.
before - - the parts of the document that occurred before the Tag.
tag - - the tag to handle.
where - - the index of the cell in which to put the result of the handling of the tag.
